note: I edit videos! I cook food! I watch movies! I play video games! I drink bourbon! I probably do other stuff sometimes, too!

fields.name: Profile pic
fields.value: A fella with sweet-ass mutton chops (me!) stares suspiciously into a mirror. He holds a camera on a gimbal in one hand, and takes this very photo on a phone held in the other.

fields.name: Header pic
fields.value: Close-up shot of an element from an old pinball machine that lights up to read “Cheezy bonus when lit”
